member.name: T:My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ngrok
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Byte[].

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Name
member.summary: Identify the tunnel by name.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Proto
member.summary: tunnel protocol name, one of http, tcp, tls.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Addr
member.summary: forward traffic to this local port number or network address.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Inspect
member.summary: enable http request inspection.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Auth
member.summary: HTTP basic authentication credentials to enforce on tunneled requests.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Host_Header
member.summary: Rewrite the HTTP Host header to this value, or preserve to leave it unchanged.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Bind_TLS
member.summary: bind an HTTPS or HTTP endpoint or both true, false, or both.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Subdomain
member.summary: subdomain name to request. If unspecified, uses the tunnel name.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.HostName
member.summary: hostname to request (requires reserved name and DNS CNAME).

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.CRT
member.summary: PEM TLS certificate at this path to terminate TLS traffic before forwarding locally.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Key
member.summary: PEM TLS private key at this path to terminate TLS traffic before forwarding locally.

member.name: P:Config.ConfigTunnel.Remote_Addr
member.summary: bind the remote TCP port on the given address.

member.name: P:NgrokWrapper.IP
member.summary: Forward ngrok to provided IP.

member.name: P:NgrokWrapper.Port
member.summary: Forward ngrok to provided Port.

member.name: P:NgrokWrapper.Subdomain
member.summary: Ngrok subdomain to be used. Only usable if authtoken is provided.

member.name: P:NgrokWrapper.AuthToken
member.summary: Ngrok authtoken for premium ngrok user.

member.name: P:NgrokWrapper.Region
member.summary: Ngrok region to be used. Default is using asia pacific.

member.name: P:NgrokWrapper.UseTLS
member.summary: Enable HTTPS.

member.name: P:NgrokWrapper.NgrokPort
member.summary: Local Ngrok IP address. Default is 4040.

member.name: M:NgrokWrapper.StopNgrokInstances
member.summary: Kill all ngrok instances.
